channel.title: I need codes to make me a mod
channel.description: tell me people i need to kno how to make me a mod

item.title: I need codes to make me a mod
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

Well then you’re just an idiot.

This is you:
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 10:45:32 PM[/size][hr]Oh wait I remember! While in the game press Start then, while holding the L and R Triggers press Up, Down, Up, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, A, B, A, B. If you see a little picture of a guy and hear someone say “Toasty!”, quickly press Down and Start. Then just log out and log back in and you’ll be a goldcrown mod.

Lol. There’s an obscure Mortal Kombat reference.

Read full topic

if you the admin of the server you can go to char folder and look for Charisright= 0 ( change it to 1 for silver crown and 2 for gold crown)

item.source: I need codes to make me a mod

item.title: I need codes to make me a mod
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

Go to the folder where Mopar and your source files are. Go into the source file folder and go to data. There are 3 separate text files. Administrator, Moderator and Staff. Simply type your character name into the Admin.txt and save it, run the compiler, run the runserver and log in.

Read full topic
